alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 6:50PM MST until August 16 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 650 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scottsdale, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Fountain Hills, Carefree, McDowell Mountain Park, Scottsdale Airport, Desert Ridge Marketplace, Rio Verde, and Fort McDowell. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 188 and 190. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 32 and 43. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
